Package Persistence

Class Persistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • Persistence.Persistence
  • public class Persistence
extends java.lang.Object
    The main module of Persistence. Base class for calling all functions of Persistence.
    Author:
    Lukas Stanley

    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        public static Level getLevel​(int levelNumber)
        Get a level by specifying which number it is. Json file is loaded into a Level accordingly and returned.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - Which level to load.
        Returns:
        The JSON file loaded in Level format.

      • saveGame

        public static boolean saveGame​(int remainingTime,
                               Player player,
                               java.util.Set<AbstractActor> set,
                               int levelNumber,
                               AbstractTile[][] tiles)
        Save a level's current state for later loading.
        Parameters:
        remainingTime - The remaining time to save.
        player - The player which occupies the level as it is saved.
        set - The enemies of the current level in an ArrayList format.
        levelNumber - The level number which is being saved.
        tiles - The 2d array of tiles which comprise the level.
        Returns:
        whether or not the save was successful.

      • loadGame

        public static Level loadGame​(int levelNumber)
        Load a level in a given save state.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - which level to load in it's saved state.
        Returns:
        the Level object, which has been re-loaded and then converted to the saved state.

      • eraseSave

        public static boolean eraseSave​(int levelNumber)
        Erase the save of a given level.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - which level's save to erase.
        Returns:
        whether or not the save was successfully erased.
